mapper.update:
update tbplay
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
playerid = #{playerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
picpath = #{picpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
streamaddress = #{streamaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
playaddress = #{playaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
replayaddress = #{replayaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realaddress = #{realaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = now(),
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbplay set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, playerid = #{playerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, picpath = #{picpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, streamaddress = #{streamaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playaddress = #{playaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, replayaddress = #{replayaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realaddress = #{realaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = now(), remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from tbplay where `status`>0 and #{endtime}>=begintime and begintime>=#{begintime} and del_flag='0'

select
from tbplay where `status`!=3 and del_flag='0' and playerid=#{playerId} and ( (DATE_FORMAT(begintime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{begintime} AND #{endtime}>=DATE_FORMAT(begintime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) OR ( #{begintime}>=DATE_FORMAT(begintime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{endtime}) OR (DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{begintime} AND #{endtime}>=DATE_FORMAT(endtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) )

select
from tbplay where del_flag='0' order by id desc

select
from tbplay where playerid=#{playerId} and status=#{status} and del_flag='0'

select
from tbplay where del_flag='0' and 3>status and status>0

select
from tbplay where playerid=#{playerId} and del_flag='0'
